Copper Plate

armor (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 207
armor id [armor]: 89 (Copper Plate)
protection, body [protbody]: 13
defence [def]: -1
encumbrance [enc]: 2
resist shock [shockres]: +25
start battle spell [startbattlespell]: #592 Charge Body

Requires 5A to forge (A1)

The wearer of this magic plate cuirass is granted almost total immunity to lightning. When first struck in battle, the armor will unleash a blast of lightning upon the attacker and the wearer of this plate.
